thread.title: Dirty and not worth the money
thread.title_full: Dirty and not worth the money - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kras2fr
title: Dirty and not worth the money
text:
Bathroom full of mold, radiator pipes make noise all night, walls so thin you can hear neighbors and people in the hallway. 2 cocktails were $50. The bathroom was so small, I had to open the door to blow dry my hair. All of the ivy in the lobby was covered in dust.
Room Tip: Hotel needs a major update. See more room tips
